item.title: U.S. Hits Brazil With 50% Tariffs and Sanctions in Sharp Escalation
item.description: The White House hit Brazil on Wednesday with a 50 percent tariff and sanctions on a justice overseeing investigations into former President Jair Bolso...

item.title: Witkoff Plans Visit to Gaza to See Hunger Crisis
item.description: Steve Witkoff met with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and was expected to visit an aid distribution site in the enclave.

item.title: Modi’s ‘True Friend’ Trump Deals India a Big Blow With Tariff Threats
item.description: India’s prime minister has made a big effort to build closer ties using his rapport with the U.S. president, but critics say he is getting little in r...

item.title: Trump Tells Russian Official to ‘Watch His Words,’ but He Bites Back Instead
item.description: The former Russian president Dmitri Medvedev offers President Trump a useful foil to criticize without rebuking Vladimir Putin, one analyst said.

item.title: After Backlash, Ukraine Votes to Restore Watchdogs’ Powers
item.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky’s move last week to neuter two anticorruption agencies drew the country’s first street protests since Russia’s invasion.
